g3801.pronunciation: ho own kahee ho ane kahee ho er-khom'-en-os
g3801.unicode: ὁ ὢν καί ὁ ἦν καί ὁ ἐρχόμενος
g3801.translit: ho ṑn kaí ho ēn kaí ho erchómenos
g3801.definition: [ὁ ὢν καί ὁ ἦν καί ὁ ἐρχόμενος] a phrase combining {{g3588}} with the present participle and imperfect of {{g1510}} and the present participle of {{g2064}} by means of {{g2532}}; the one being and the one that was and the one coming, i.e. the Eternal, as a divine epithet of Christ

g3803.definition: [παγίς] from {{g4078}}; a trap (as fastened by a noose or notch); figuratively, a trick or statagem (temptation)

g3804.definition: [πάθημα] from a presumed derivative of {{g3806}}; something undergone, i.e. hardship or pain; subjectively, an emotion or influence

g3805.definition: [παθητός] from the same as {{g3804}}; liable (i.e. doomed) to experience pain

g3806.definition: [πάθος] from the alternate of {{g3958}}; properly, suffering ("pathos"), i.e. (subjectively) a passion (especially concupiscence)

g3807.definition: [παιδαγωγός] from {{g3816}} and a reduplicated form of {{g71}}; a boy-leader, i.e. a servant whose office it was to take the children to school; (by implication, (figuratively) a tutor ("pædagogue"))

g3808.definition: [παιδάριον] neuter of a presumed derivative of {{g3816}}; a little boy

g3809.definition: [παιδεία] from {{g3811}}; tutorage, i.e. education or training; by implication, disciplinary correction

g3810.definition: [παιδευτής] from {{g3811}}; a trainer, i.e. teacher or (by implication) discipliner

g3811.definition: [παιδεύω] from {{g3816}}; to train up a child, i.e. educate, or (by implication), discipline (by punishment)

g3813.definition: [παιδίον] neuter diminutive of {{g3816}}; a childling (of either sex), i.e. (properly), an infant, or (by extension) a half-grown boy or girl; figuratively, an immature Christian

g3814.definition: [παιδίσκη] feminine diminutive of {{g3816}}; a girl, i.e. (specially), a female slave or servant

g3816.definition: [παῖς] perhaps from {{g3817}}; a boy (as often beaten with impunity), or (by analogy), a girl, and (genitive case) a child; specially, a slave or servant (especially a minister to a king; and by eminence to God)

g3817.definition: [παίω] a primary verb; to hit (as if by a single blow and less violently than {{g5180}}); specially, to sting (as a scorpion)

g3818.definition: [Πακατιανή] feminine of an adjective of uncertain derivation; Pacatianian, a section of Phrygia

g3819.definition: [πάλαι] probably another form for {{g3825}} (through the idea of retrocession); (adverbially) formerly, or (by relatively) sometime since; (elliptically as adjective) ancient

g3820.definition: [παλαιός] from {{g3819}}; antique, i.e. not recent, worn out

g3822.definition: [παλαιόω] from {{g3820}}; to make (passively, become) worn out, or declare obsolete

g3823.definition: [πάλη] from πάλλω (to vibrate; another form for {{g906}}); wrestling

g3824.definition: [παλιγγενεσία] from {{g3825}} and {{g1078}}; (spiritual) rebirth (the state or the act), i.e. (figuratively) spiritual renovation; specially, Messianic restoration

g3825.definition: [πάλιν] probably from the same as {{g3823}} (through the idea of oscillatory repetition); (adverbially) anew, i.e. (of place) back, (of time) once more, or (conjunctionally) furthermore or on the other hand

g3826.definition: [παμπληθεί] dative case (adverb) of a compound of {{g3956}} and {{g4128}}; in full multitude, i.e. concertedly or simultaneously

g3827.definition: [πάμπολυς] from {{g3956}} and {{g4183}}; full many, i.e. immense

g3828.definition: [Παμφυλία] from a compound of {{g3956}} and {{g4443}}; every-tribal, i.e. heterogeneous ({{g5561}} being implied); Pamphylia, a region of Asia Minor

g3829.definition: [πανδοχεῖον] neuter of a presumed compound of {{g3956}} and a derivative of {{g1209}}; all-receptive, i.e. a public lodging-place (caravanserai or khan)

g3830.definition: [πανδοχεύς] from the same as {{g3829}}; an innkeeper (warden of a caravanserai)

g3831.definition: [πανήγυρις] from {{g3956}} and a derivative of {{g58}}; a mass-meeting, i.e. (figuratively) universal companionship

g3832.definition: [πανοικί] adverb from {{g3956}} and {{g3624}}; with the whole family

g3833.definition: [πανοπλία] from a compound of {{g3956}} and {{g3696}}; full armor ("panoply")

g3834.definition: [πανουργία] from {{g3835}}; adroitness, i.e. (in a bad sense) trickery or sophistry

g3836.definition: [πανταχόθεν] adverb (of source) from {{g3837}}; from all directions

g3837.definition: [πανταχοῦ] genitive case (as adverb of place) of a presumed derivative of {{g3956}}; universally

g3838.definition: [παντελής] from {{g3956}} and {{g5056}}; full-ended, i.e. entire (neuter as noun, completion)

g3840.definition: [πάντοθεν] adverb (of source) from {{g3956}}; from (i.e. on) all sides

g3841.definition: [παντοκράτωρ] from {{g3956}} and {{g2904}}; the all-ruling, i.e. God (as absolute and universal sovereign)

g3842.definition: [πάντοτε] from {{g3956}} and {{g3753}}; every when, i.e. at all times

g3843.definition: [πάντως] adverb from {{g3956}}; entirely; specially, at all events, (with negative, following) in no event

g3844.definition: [παρά] a primary preposition; properly, near; i.e. (with genitive case) from beside (literally or figuratively), (with dative case) at (or in) the vicinity of (objectively or subjectively), (with accusative case) to the proximity with (local (especially beyond or opposed to) or causal (on account of) In compounds it retains the same variety of application.

g3845.definition: [παραβαίνω] from {{g3844}} and the base of {{g939}}; to go contrary to, i.e. violate a command

g3846.definition: [παραβάλλω] from {{g3844}} and {{g906}}; to throw alongside, i.e. (reflexively) to reach a place, or (figuratively) to liken

g3849.definition: [παραβιάζομαι] from {{g3844}} and the middle voice of {{g971}}; to force contrary to (nature), i.e. compel (by entreaty)

g3850.definition: [παραβολή] from {{g3846}}; a similitude ("parable"), i.e. (symbolic) fictitious narrative (of common life conveying a moral), apothegm or adage

g3851.definition: [παραβουλεύομαι] from {{g3844}} and the middle voice of {{g1011}}; to misconsult, i.e. disregard

g3853.definition: [παραγγέλλω] from {{g3844}} and the base of {{g32}}; to transmit a message, i.e. (by implication) to enjoin

g3854.definition: [παραγίνομαι] from {{g3844}} and {{g1096}}; to become near, i.e. approach (have arrived); by implication, to appear publicly

g3855.definition: [παράγω] from {{g3844}} and {{g71}}; to lead near, i.e. (reflexively or intransitively) to go along or away

g3856.definition: [παραδειγματίζω] from {{g3844}} and {{g1165}}; to show alongside (the public), i.e. expose to infamy

g3857.definition: [παράδεισος] of Oriental origin (compare {{h6508}}); a park, i.e. (specially), an Eden (place of future happiness, "paradise")

g3858.definition: [παραδέχομαι] from {{g3844}} and {{g1209}}; to accept near, i.e. admit or (by implication) delight in

g3859.definition: [παραδιατριβή] from a compound of {{g3844}} and {{g1304}}; misemployment, i.e. meddlesomeness

g3860.definition: [παραδίδωμι] from {{g3844}} and {{g1325}}; to surrender, i.e yield up, intrust, transmit

g3861.definition: [παράδοξος] from {{g3844}} and {{g1391}} (in the sense of seeming); contrary to expectation, i.e. extraordinary ("paradox")

g3862.definition: [παράδοσις] from {{g3860}}; transmission, i.e. (concretely) a precept; specially, the Jewish traditionary law

g3863.definition: [παραζηλόω] from {{g3844}} and {{g2206}}; to stimulate alongside, i.e. excite to rivalry

g3864.definition: [παραθαλάσσιος] from {{g3844}} and {{g2281}}; along the sea, i.e. maritime (lacustrine)

g3865.definition: [παραθεωρέω] from {{g3844}} and {{g2334}}; to overlook or disregard

g3867.definition: [παραινέω] from {{g3844}} and {{g134}}; to mispraise, i.e. recommend or advise (a different course)

g3868.definition: [παραιτέομαι] from {{g3844}} and the middle voice of {{g154}}; to beg off, i.e. deprecate, decline, shun

g3869.definition: [παρακαθίζω] from {{g3844}} and {{g2523}}; to sit down near

g3870.definition: [παρακαλέω] from {{g3844}} and {{g2564}}; to call near, i.e. invite, invoke (by imploration, hortation or consolation)

g3871.definition: [παρακαλύπτω] from {{g3844}} and {{g2572}}; to cover alongside, i.e. veil (figuratively)

g3872.definition: [παρακαταθήκη] from a compound of {{g3844}} and {{g2698}}; something put down alongside, i.e. a deposit (sacred trust)

g3873.definition: [παράκειμαι] from {{g3844}} and {{g2749}}; to lie near, i.e. be at hand (figuratively, be prompt or easy)

g3877.definition: [παρακολουθέω] from {{g3844}} and {{g190}}; to follow near, i.e. (figuratively) attend (as a result), trace out, conform to

g3878.definition: [παρακούω] from {{g3844}} and {{g191}}; to mishear, i.e. (by implication) to disobey

g3879.definition: [παρακύπτω] from {{g3844}} and {{g2955}}; to bend beside, i.e. lean over (so as to peer within)

g3880.definition: [παραλαμβάνω] from {{g3844}} and {{g2983}}; to receive near, i.e. associate with oneself (in any familiar or intimate act or relation); by analogy, to assume an office; figuratively, to learn

g3881.definition: [παραλέγομαι] from {{g3844}} and the middle voice of {{g3004}} (in its original sense); (specially), to lay one's course near, i.e. sail past

g3882.definition: [παράλιος] from {{g3844}} and {{g251}}; beside the salt (sea), i.e. maritime

g3883.definition: [παραλλαγή] from a compound of {{g3844}} and {{g236}}; transmutation (of phase or orbit), i.e. (figuratively) fickleness

g3884.definition: [παραλογίζομαι] from {{g3844}} and {{g3049}}; to misreckon, i.e. delude

g3885.definition: [παραλυτικός] from a derivative of {{g3886}}; as if dissolved, i.e. "paralytic"

g3886.definition: [παραλύω] from {{g3844}} and {{g3089}}; to loosen beside, i.e. relax (perfect passive participle, paralyzed or enfeebled)

g3887.definition: [παραμένω] from {{g3844}} and {{g3306}}; to stay near, i.e. remain (literally, tarry; or figuratively, be permanent, persevere)

g3888.definition: [παραμυθέομαι] from {{g3844}} and the middle voice of a derivative of {{g3454}}; to relate near, i.e. (by implication) encourage, console

g3891.definition: [παρανομέω] from a compound of {{g3844}} and {{g3551}}; to be opposed to law, i.e. to transgress

g3893.definition: [παραπικραίνω] from {{g3844}} and {{g4087}}; to embitter alongside, i.e. (figuratively) to exasperate

g3895.definition: [παραπίπτω] from {{g3844}} and {{g4098}}; to fall aside, i.e. (figuratively) to apostatize

g3897.definition: [παραπλήσιον] neuter of a compound of {{g3844}} and the base of {{g4139}} (as adverb); close by, i.e. (figuratively) almost

g3898.definition: [παραπλησίως] adverb from the same as {{g3897}}; in a manner near by, i.e. (figuratively) similarly

g3900.definition: [παράπτωμα] from {{g3895}}; a side-slip (lapse or deviation), i.e. (unintentional) error or (wilful) transgression
